name: Pinkpop

config_properties.name: Pinkpop
config_properties.description: The longest-running annual music festival in the Netherlands, held in Landgraaf since 1970.

ai_profile:
**Pinkpop 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Genre Fusion**

The 2026 edition of Pinkpop brings together an eclectic lineup of 32 artists spanning a wide array of genres, with a strong emphasis on alternative rock (8 artists), pop (7 artists), and indie rock (6 artists). The festival maintains its reputation as a haven for alternative music lovers while embracing a wider spectrum, from post-punk revival to electropop and even niche styles like grunge, synth-pop, and metalcore. With each act boasting Spotify links, attendees can explore the full lineup before the festival, ensuring a curated experience tailored to their tastes.

Pinkpop 2026 also showcases a commendable mix of international talent. The United Kingdom and the United States dominate the roster with nine artists each, while seven acts proudly represent the Netherlands, the festival’s home country. The remaining performers hail from Germany, Canada, Belgium, Australia, and Sweden, adding a global flair. However, the lineup reflects room for growth in racial diversity, with only one person of color featured this year. On the gender front, women and mixed-gender acts account for 12 of the 32 performances, highlighting incremental progress toward a more balanced representation.

With an average artist rating of 6.88, Pinkpop 2026 promises quality performances, featuring a mix of critically acclaimed acts and rising stars. While most acts fall within the 7-8 rating range, two highly rated artists (9-10) are sure to deliver standout moments. Whether you’re into indie vibes, energetic punk rock, or the rhythmic allure of electropop, Pinkpop 2026 continues its legacy as a vibrant celebration of music, diversity, and discovery.
